Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory196.png'}
{3: 'It all still feels so surreal...'}
{3: 'Is it because of the intense series of events? Now that everything is finally over, you instead feel like being in a dream.'}
{3: "A few days after that, Babylonia sent the Support Force and Engineering Force to Venus Splash Park's vicinity..."}
{3: 'And in the end, they found no Ascendants traces in a 300-kilometer radius.'}
{3: '"They must have gotten what they came for," said President Hassen.'}
{3: 'But what did the death of Shome, and all the events surrounding the Venus Splash Park accomplish? Perhaps, only time will tell.'}
{3: 'President Hassen, like his usual self, laughs it off, saying that he can do the worrying. And as for you all, those who went through this horror-show: Get some rest and wait for orders.'}
{3: 'Lucia and Lee are carrying I-beams around, things a human obviously cannot help with. They must be helping out in the Engineering Force.'}
{3: 'Ayla is arguing with Karenina over something...'}
{3: "Camu, who lost track of Roland's whereabouts, has just been silent. He did not leave, but perhaps a word or two asking if he wants to be here would be nice?"}
{3: 'As for the rest, they probably went to play.'}
{2: "Guess I'll go entertain myself.", 3: '15'}
{3: 'Well, not like they need help.'}
{3: "Oh? Someone's on the Ferris wheel..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory197.png'}
{2: 'What are you doing here?', 3: '22'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Why can't I be here? It's not like you own this place.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'What are you getting at?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: '...Spare the thanks. I just happened to have an adrenaline shot left.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: '...And, people I save—they rarely live long.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Still, thank you.', 3: '32'}
{3: 'Hearing this, Vera raises her eyebrows as if offended.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "...Guess you really aren't afraid of death.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "You almost became commandant-mince from that Gabriel, and now you're involving yourself with Death again?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'So, what are you here for?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Just to say thanks?', 4: '1'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Yep. Commandant's coming by just to express gratitude.", 4: '2'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'So just return a "you\'re welcome," Vera.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Carrying a bowl of icy-looking snacks, Lee inserts himself between you and Vera.'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Here, the engies made this after they fixed up the vending machine over there.', 4: '2'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'This thing\'s called "Venus Splash Park Special: Classic Summer Shaved Ice," or something.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "You what? And what's with that get-up?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You came all the way here, to give me this? Ridiculous.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Looks like that beastly Lee from before is now all domesticated.', 4: '1'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Lee', 3: "No, I'm just being extra cautious around you.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hah, should I try applying and transferring your precious commandant over to Cerberus?', 4: '1'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Lee', 3: "That's not going to happen.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera continues on, ignoring your puzzled expression.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'So, Kurono kiddo, what "exactly" are you here for?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "If it's just to protect your Commandant, you can have 'em back now.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Lee stays silent for a while, then he shoves the shaved ice into Vera's hands."}
{1: '2', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Like Commandant, I've come here to express my thanks.", 4: '2'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Regardless of what you're actually doing here, you did save Commandant's life.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Not having expected such a situation, Vera pauses for a tiny flicker of time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "What's the point of Constructs eating something that's just taste, and no substance?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Since this is human food, shouldn't you be giving it to 【kuroname】?", 4: '1'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'If I gave our dear injured personnel this, Liv will burn me at the stake.', 4: '2'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Lee', 3: "You can try, if you wanna die. I still want to live a lil' longer.", 4: '2'}
{3: "A slight frown shows up on Vera's face, but almost instantly, her usual smirk returns."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Fine. You say thanks, and I accept.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "You've really changed, Lee.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "...Alright, alright. Hurry on and get lost now. You're disturbing my peace and quiet.", 4: '1'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Lee', 3: "You need lessons in lying. You've never been the peace-and-quiet type.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Guess I've changed, too.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You turn to leave, but Vera speaks, once more.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "The others in Cerberus will be off on another mission, and I'll be a free agent for a while—Nikola's orders."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Before Cerberus finally gets a commandant, the higher-ups will likely be having headaches about where to settle us jinxes.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Eeny, meeny, miny, moe, I wonder which squad I should go plague next.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Oh, I wonder.'}
